(1,): As a system administrator, I want to configure database connections, so that the application can interact with the database securely and efficiently As a UI designer, I want to redesign the resources page, so that users can access documentation and support materials more easily As a user, I want to access the resources page, so that I can find documentation and submission guidelines
(2,): As a developer, I want to implement logging, so that I can monitor and troubleshoot application issues As a file uploader, I want to generate a file hash, so that I can verify file integrity and uniqueness As a testing coordinator, I want to generate user testing reports, so that I can document test results for agencies As a validator, I want to validate D file content via API, so that I can ensure compliance before processing As a developer, I want to create an uploads directory automatically, so that file submissions can be saved without manual setup
(3,): As a data manager, I want to process deletions for a specific date, so that outdated records are marked as deleted in the database As a submission manager, I want to update the publish status of a submission, so that stakeholders can track the submission lifecycle As a validator, I want to validate FABS submission files, so that they meet required standards before processing As a visitor, I want to view the homepage, so that I can navigate to FABS or DABS sections As a submitter, I want to upload FABS submission files, so that my data can be processed and published As a user, I want to check the status of my submission, so that I know its current processing state
(0,): As a user, I want to upload files securely, so that my submissions are saved without naming conflicts or security risks As a GTAS administrator, I want to set GTAS submission windows, so that submissions are only accepted during approved periods
